Text:
why is it so hard to find one album
i am angered by this faggotry
hi again dont suppose you know of any other bands that are sort off like this one?? :)

to,
" sxypink at 2009-08-18 14:12 CET:
hi again dont suppose you know of any other bands that are sort off like this one?? :)"

listen to GOOSE, the bloody beetroots, crookers, MSTRKRFT, Boys Noize, DatA, Deadmau5, Don Diablo,"Does it Offend You, Yeah?"

have fun ^^

@sxypink: probably a little closer to what you were looking for, check out:

Soulwax (and their amazing album Nite Versions), !!!, The Rapture, Hot Chip, YACHT, The Phenomenal Handclap Band, and pretty much any band signed to DFA Records (which James Murphy co-founded). 

All of these bands and LCD Soundsystem are classified as Dance Punk.

Although the list by rageagainstthemachine is pretty good it's mostly unrelated Electronica except for Goose and early MSTRKRFT.
